title: Reconnect bug
body: So i load into champ select and pick my champion then the loading screen launches like usually. However once the loading screen launches it instantly closes and reverts back to the screen in the client that provides the reconnect button. However when i click it it does nothing. This happens in all game modes including customs please help.

replies.body: Your network might be having some problems keeping a stable connection with the game servers once you start loading into the match. If your network becomes unstable while on that loading screen, it makes it really difficult for the client to get you back in the game. Check our the steps [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and we should be able to at least narrow down the main issue.

Sounds like your network isn't establishing a connection to the game servers.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
